datasets.name: ds_kpi_events
datasets.query: SELECT FORMAT_NUMBER(COUNT(*), 0) AS total_events, FORMAT_NUMBER(COUNT(DISTINCT user_identity), 0) AS unique_users FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAYS

datasets.name: ds_kpi_high_risk
datasets.query: SELECT FORMAT_NUMBER(SUM(CASE WHEN action_name LIKE '%delete%' OR action_name LIKE '%drop%' OR action_name LIKE '%revoke%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS high_risk_events FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAYS

datasets.name: ds_kpi_denied
datasets.query: SELECT FORMAT_NUMBER(SUM(CASE WHEN response_status_code >= 400 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS denied_access FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAYS

datasets.name: ds_kpi_permissions
datasets.query: SELECT FORMAT_NUMBER(SUM(CASE WHEN action_name LIKE '%grant%' OR action_name LIKE '%revoke%' OR action_name LIKE '%permission%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS permission_changes FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAYS

datasets.name: ds_kpi_admin
datasets.query: SELECT FORMAT_NUMBER(SUM(CASE WHEN action_name LIKE '%admin%' OR action_name LIKE '%create%' OR action_name LIKE '%delete%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS admin_actions FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAYS

datasets.name: ds_event_trend
datasets.query: SELECT DATE(event_time) AS day, COUNT(*) AS event_count, COUNT(DISTINCT user_identity) AS unique_users FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAYS GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

datasets.name: ds_risk_trend
datasets.query: SELECT DATE(event_time) AS day, SUM(CASE WHEN action_name LIKE '%delete%' OR action_name LIKE '%drop%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS high_risk, SUM(CASE WHEN action_name LIKE '%update%' OR action_name LIKE '%modify%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS medium_risk FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAYS GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

datasets.name: ds_denied_access
datasets.query: SELECT user_identity, action_name, service_name, event_time, source_ip_address AS source_ip FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAYS AND response_status_code >= 400 ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 30

datasets.name: ds_permission_changes
datasets.query: SELECT user_identity, action_name, COALESCE(request_params_securable_full_name, request_params_full_name, 'N/A') AS target_entity, event_time FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAYS AND (action_name LIKE '%grant%' OR action_name LIKE '%revoke%' OR action_name LIKE '%permission%') ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 30

datasets.name: ds_denied_by_service
datasets.query: SELECT service_name, COUNT(*) AS denial_count FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAYS AND response_status_code >= 400 GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10

datasets.name: ds_denied_by_user
datasets.query: SELECT user_identity, COUNT(*) AS denial_count FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAYS AND response_status_code >= 400 GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10

datasets.name: ds_admin_actions
datasets.query: SELECT user_identity, action_name, service_name, COALESCE(request_params_securable_full_name, request_params_full_name, 'N/A') AS target_entity, event_time FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAYS AND (action_name LIKE '%admin%' OR action_name LIKE '%create%' OR action_name LIKE '%delete%') ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 30

datasets.name: ds_sensitive_actions
datasets.query: SELECT user_identity, action_name, service_name, event_time FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAYS AND (action_name LIKE '%delete%' OR action_name LIKE '%drop%' OR action_name LIKE '%revoke%') ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 30

datasets.name: ds_admin_by_action
datasets.query: SELECT action_name, COUNT(*) AS action_count FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAYS AND (action_name LIKE '%admin%' OR action_name LIKE '%create%' OR action_name LIKE '%delete%') GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10

datasets.name: ds_data_access
datasets.query: SELECT user_identity, action_name, COALESCE(request_params_securable_full_name, request_params_full_name, 'N/A') AS target_table, COUNT(*) AS access_count FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAYS AND service_name = 'unityCatalog' GROUP BY 1, 2, 3 ORDER BY 4 DESC LIMIT 30

datasets.name: ds_access_by_service
datasets.query: SELECT service_name, COUNT(*) AS access_count FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAYS GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10

datasets.name: ds_access_hourly
datasets.query: SELECT HOUR(event_time) AS hour, COUNT(*) AS access_count FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_audit_logs WHERE event_time >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAYS GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

datasets.name: ds_ml_threats
datasets.query: SELECT 'user@example.com' AS user_identity, 'N/A' AS threat_type, 0.0 AS risk_score, 0.0 AS confidence, CURRENT_DATE() AS prediction_date WHERE 1=0 UNION ALL SELECT 'Run ML inference pipeline' AS user_identity, 'Pending' AS threat_type, 0.0 AS risk_score, 0.0 AS confidence, CURRENT_DATE() AS prediction_date LIMIT 1

datasets.name: ds_ml_exfiltration
datasets.query: SELECT 'user@example.com' AS user_identity, 0.0 AS data_volume, 'N/A' AS risk_level, 0.0 AS anomaly_score WHERE 1=0 UNION ALL SELECT 'Run ML inference pipeline' AS user_identity, 0.0 AS data_volume, 'Pending' AS risk_level, 0.0 AS anomaly_score LIMIT 1

datasets.name: ds_ml_privilege
datasets.query: SELECT 'user@example.com' AS user_identity, 'N/A' AS current_role, 'N/A' AS escalation_risk, 0.0 AS confidence WHERE 1=0 UNION ALL SELECT 'Run ML inference pipeline' AS user_identity, 'N/A' AS current_role, 'Pending' AS escalation_risk, 0.0 AS confidence LIMIT 1

datasets.name: ds_monitor_latest
datasets.query: SELECT FORMAT_NUMBER(COALESCE(total_events, 0), 0) AS total_events, FORMAT_NUMBER(COALESCE(unique_users, 0), 0) AS unique_users, CONCAT(ROUND(COALESCE(high_risk_rate, 0) * 100, 1), '%') AS high_risk_rate FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}_monitoring.fact_audit_logs_profile_metrics WHERE log_type = 'INPUT' AND column_name = ':table' ORDER BY window.start DESC LIMIT 1

datasets.name: ds_monitor_trend
datasets.query: SELECT window.start AS window_start, COALESCE(total_events, 0) AS total_events, COALESCE(high_risk_events, 0) AS high_risk_events FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}_monitoring.fact_audit_logs_profile_metrics WHERE log_type = 'INPUT' AND column_name = ':table' AND window.start >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAYS ORDER BY window.start

datasets.name: ds_monitor_access
datasets.query: SELECT window.start AS window_start, COALESCE(denied_accesses, 0) AS denied_accesses, COALESCE(permission_changes, 0) AS permission_changes FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}_monitoring.fact_audit_logs_profile_metrics WHERE log_type = 'INPUT' AND column_name = ':table' AND window.start >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAYS ORDER BY window.start

datasets.name: ds_monitor_drift
datasets.query: SELECT window.start AS window_start, ROUND(COALESCE(event_volume_drift_pct, 0), 1) AS event_volume_drift, ROUND(COALESCE(risk_level_drift_pct, 0), 1) AS risk_level_drift FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}_monitoring.fact_audit_logs_drift_metrics WHERE column_name = ':table' AND drift_type = 'CONSECUTIVE' AND window.start >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAYS ORDER BY window.start

datasets.name: ds_monitor_detailed
datasets.query: SELECT window.start AS window_start, COALESCE(total_events, 0) AS total_events, COALESCE(unique_users, 0) AS unique_users, COALESCE(high_risk_events, 0) AS high_risk_events, COALESCE(denied_accesses, 0) AS denied_accesses FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}_monitoring.fact_audit_logs_profile_metrics WHERE log_type = 'INPUT' AND column_name = ':table' AND window.start >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAYS ORDER BY window.start DESC
